flags.title: User-Contributed Project
flags.text: This project guide is not managed by MAKE staff.

guide.introduction: Make a great video! This is how to upload and save your videos onto your Windows machine.
guide.introduction_rendered: Make a great video! This is how to upload and save your videos onto your Windows machine.

lines.text: First, shoot a video on a camcorder.
lines.text_raw: First, shoot a video on a camcorder.

lines.text: Upload the video to your computer, and save it to a file.
lines.text_raw: Upload the video to your computer, and save it to a file.

lines.text: Open the Windows Movie Maker software (built into Windows computers).
lines.text_raw: Open the Windows Movie Maker software (built into Windows computers).

lines.text: Look for the file you saved your video in.
lines.text_raw: Look for the file you saved your video in.

lines.text: Click the video once. Then, click "Open."
lines.text_raw: Click the video once. Then, click "Open."

lines.text: Do the same thing for all the other videos you shot.
lines.text_raw: Do the same thing for all the other videos you shot.

lines.text: If you want to save the video you made, click the TV icon at the top of the screen. Enter the name of the file you want to save it to, and click "Save."
lines.text_raw: If you want to save the video you made, click the TV icon at the top of the screen. Enter the name of the file you want to save it to, and click "Save."

guide.summary: Uploading and saving your videos in Windows is easy.
guide.title: Create Video in Windows Movie Maker
